attributes.action: Stop the clocks going back this month. We don't want another hour of 2020.
attributes.additional_details: 2020 has been a long, hard year for everybody. Lets not delay getting rid of it.
attributes.background: Delay clocks going back until 02:00 on the 1st of January 2021

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321333
